name: Bathroom Adventure
description:
Get ready for the best toilet game and prepare yourself for unlimited entertainment! Toilet & Bathroom Rush is 100% FREE-RANGE FUN!

Having to stay on toilet for a long time will soon become frustrating and boring. How to stay entertained during toilet time is a mission impossible until the arrival of Toilet & Bathroom Rush! Enjoy 14 hilarious mini games as you try to collect toilet papers and unlock mysterious items in the toilet museum. This game is fun for anyone who loves a good challenge!

Game Features:
- Smooth and simple controls make playing easy, intuitive and enjoyable
- 14 different mini games with radically different strategies to master
- Collect toilet papers to unlock 18 unique and cool toilet items
- Stunning graphics and multiple charming soundtracks
